div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1528 Tell Suikas, c. 6 km. S of Djeble (anc. Gabala), Seleucis, 1958 Burial: c. 240 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 10 AR. From excavations Alexander III: 3 post. tetradr. (Aradus) 2 post. dr. (Aradus) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 2 tetradr. Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim as ESM 177) Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia as WSM 971) Disposition: unknown AnnArch de Syria 1958-9, p. 125
